channel.title: Need Java coders who know how to make rsc p servers plz
channel.description: i need java coders who know how to make a runescape classic private server and I want the source and client i want to make one like "rscemulation.net" or "www.rsc-live.com" The same client and source so please anyone who could do that add my email "alkadbanm@yahoo.com" thanks and please! will you do it for free lol. help me come on guys ill do all the steps thanks!

item.title: Need Java coders who know how to make rsc p servers plz
item.dc:creator: @f_2_p_2_p_f f 2 p 2 p f
item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

Step 1:
You should search the board for a source+client you can use download it, then once you find out you need apache you will finally just go back to an rs2 server & leave us be.

Step 2:
Or learn java (or some other language & ask for aid from someone to help you learn java)
then repeat step 1

item.title: Need Java coders who know how to make rsc p servers plz
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

[quote author=gawdz666 link=topic=433288.msg3181826#msg3181826 date=1271376827]i lold RSCE isnt that advanced.

How would you know?

It’s certainly improved since you left…

Also, what he’s saying is it took 20 people to create, which isn’t true – we just thanked everyone who offered ideas/help along the way. You could say it would take 500 people to make but it doesn’t mean it’s advanced, certainly if there’s 500 OP’s working on it.[/quote]

Because nothing i have seen to your updates couldn’t be added by 1 person in a week.

But im not going to flame shit or talk shit imma leave it as is.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Java coders who know how to make rsc p servers plz
item.dc:creator: @Rsc-Live Rsc-Live
item.description:
@Rsc-Live wrote:

You can download RSCD V25 and Follow the tutorial to get it running correctly(Just change “apeache” to “Apache” -.-)

Here is the link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,309101.0.html

To make a server like RSCE, You have to have 20 people help you.

To make a server like mine, You have to learn it yourself as you go along(With as little help as possible, And good mods). It’s better to ask questions rather than for “Help”. Yong min is a very helpful guy, Especially when it comes to his own Source. Other than that, Be careful what questions you ask on here. Asking someone “How do i change the loading screen image?”, When it is already posted in tutorials, Doesn’t go well.

I recommend using Yong Min’s NOOBscape V3 Release, As it is better for beginners. It’s what i used at first.

Here is the link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,425255.0.html

Don’t expect people to help you until you show that you are making an attempt to learn it on your own.

Good Luck sir.

Read full topic
